document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffacc8">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">From </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffacc8">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffacc8">draw </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">never </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c094ff">touch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c094ff">Reservoir </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
